## jrctl firewall list

List firewall firewall entries

### Synopsis

List firewall firewall entries

```
jrctl firewall list [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  jrctl firewall list
```

### Options

```
  -e, --endpoint string   specify endpoint hostname (default "localhost:27482")
  -h, --help              help for list
  -t, --token string      specify auth token
```
